name: UP2010360: One Button Bank Patrol
description:
In this sort-of simulator-style hyper casual game, you are a security guard trying to maintain peace at a bank and uphold the law. Stop any robbers trying to get in or out... but let innocent people pass through. Oh, and you'd best be on point, because this bank is very strict, and one slip-up could be the end of your job...

P.S. Apologies for jagged pictures, I'm no good with graphics. :(
